segments.text: Look at those kids going for the cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy's on the stool, stretching up high to grab some.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: His sister's waiting patiently with her hand out.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They're being so clever, doing it while mom's busy.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The cookie jar is full, I bet they get a bunch.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Mom's drying that plate, totally oblivious.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But the sink is running over, water everywhere.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Puddle's getting bigger on the floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The window shows a pretty garden outside.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This kitchen adventure is fun to watch.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if they'll share with me later.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool wobbles, but they're hanging on.
segments.speaker: PAR
